title: Všade dobre, doma naj
overview: Vsade dobre, doma naj is a new trivia competition for three contestants with questions about Slovakia and Europe. In the Vsade dobre, doma naj program, contestants and viewers will find a lot of information, facts and interesting facts about their native Slovakia, but also about the old continent. The Vsade dobre, doma naj competition will bring knowledge and facts from a wide variety of sectors and areas of human activity (history, geography, culture, transport, personalities, ...), which may be related to the past, present or future of Slovakia and Europe.
